        @GetMapping("/stream/get")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.support.ResourceRegion> getCurrentStream​(@RequestHeader
                                                                                                                    org.springframework.http.HttpHeaders headers)
                                                                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Serves part of the stream currently at the front of the StreamQueue contained in the header.
        Parameters:
        headers - GET request headers that may optionally contain a "Range" field
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity representing the requested portion of the video stream
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if malformed URL is accessed

        userName - userName to add to stream queue

        Returns:
